metadata.title: CVE-2024-35940 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pstore/zone: Add a null pointer check to the psz_kmsg_read kasprintf()returns a pointer to dynamically allocated memory which can be NULL uponfailure. Ensure the allocation was successful by checking the pointervalidity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
